H0.text: Who was the French wife of Charles1st. Anne of Austria

H1.text: Who was the French wife of Charles1st. Marie de Medici

H2.text: Who was the French wife of Charles1st. Elisabeth of France

H3.text: Who was the French wife of Charles1st. Henrietta Maria

A4.text: On 1 May 1625 Charles was married by proxy to the 15‑year‑old French princess Henrietta Maria in front of the doors of Notre Dame de Paris.

A5.text: After his accession in 1625, Charles married Henrietta Maria of France.
